Community

Folktale is dedicated to providing an inclusive and harassment-free community for everyone, plase read our code of conduct. For any questions or concerns, please contact the community staff.

Support and discussion channels

  • The Folktale Mailing List on Google Groups;
  • The Folktale channel on Gitter;
  • The #folktale channel on the Freenode IRC network;
